Study Break: Astroland

Apr 22, 2008

I went to [Astroland][1] this past Sunday for a study break. Several friends and I biked from Prospect Park. The amusement park at [Coney Island][2] was supposed to close down forever after last season, but [it opened for another this year][3]! Check it out. First the video (1 minute) from the Wonder Wheel, then the photos of the day.

[1]: http://www.astroland.com/ [2]: http://www.coneyisland.com/ [3]: http://gothamist.com/2007/06/21/astroland_grant.php
